Reviews.Content: have stayed at fitz for about 8 years.have seen service,free rooms,evaporate.tired of dirty windows in rooms,ugly bedspreads that are never updated.love downtown tho so will be shopping for 'new'place to stay downtown.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Our trip to Vegas was great, the friendly staff at the Hotel,the rooms were very clean and well kept. The room had everything that a person needs and then some. The food was very good and the price of it was what we are used to paying at home. The service was very good. It is the kind of place that you don't mind telling your friends about. I'm sure that our next stay will be the same. Very pleased in Billings, Mt.

Reviews.Title: “Holy Craps, I had the luck of the Irish here!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I staggered to the craps table at midnight from our room at the Nugget. I witnessed craps shooting like I had only read about. First shooter went on forever. The second shooter went on for eternity. I think they were together because they both were using the same identical controlled throw. The money the casino paid out was positively insane. I got out of there with a big smile on my face and a bulge in my pocket! Thanks!!!

Reviews.Title: “No Complaints”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Fitz the first week of November. 5 of us cousins went to Vegas to celebrate our 40th birthdays. With 5 people staying in two rooms, there was not one complaint between all of us. I read reviews before we left. Air conditioners noisy - some noise is to be expected. Elevators slow - not a problem either. In fact we stayed on the 23rd floor. I got all the way down to the casino, found out I dropped a $20 bill, rode back up to the 23rd floor, and there was my $20 on the floor. If they were that slow, someone else would have found my $20. lol Others complained about the food at Molly's. We ate there twice and none of us found anything to complain about. My only complaint, I found my "lucky" slot machine a little too late, the morning we were leaving. Ended up putting that $20 bill in and took out $115 in 45 minutes. Staff was all nice. Loved the the comedian Wild Billy Tucker, he was a hoot. Elvis was ok, not the greatest. Absolutely no complaints. If I ever get the chance to go back to Vegas, I would stay here again in a minute.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Stayed at The Fitz first time Jan., 2004. Had a wonderful time. Their comps are great! It's right in the middle of all the action downtown. Going back in November for our anniversay.

Reviews.Title: “Not what it used to be !!”
Reviews.Author: Bobarb
Reviews.Content: Have stayed at the Fitz several times in the past 6 or 7 years and find it gets worse with each stay. Staff not as friendly, fewer perks, rooms showing more wear, just not up to what it used to be, however Limericks restaurant is still worth a visit. Will sacrifice a free room on our next visit to find a better "new home" downtown.

Reviews.Title: “unfriendly”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Our first time in Vegas, and the front desk girls were so unfriendly and the manager on duty Pam was not even freindly or helpful. The bellman named gomez was wonderful as were the girls in the cage to get players card, But the froint desk was rude.

Reviews.Title: “Awful experience!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The hotel stay was one of the worst. First day there we have no hot water in the room. We call to front desk and they say they will take care of it. They send a guy to fix it & his response was "the customers must be turning the dial wrong, because it works fine" We are not stupid and we know how to turn a dial. Then we got stuck in the elevator along with 3 other people. There is a telephone in there to use to call for help so we do. 25 minutes later we got out. They sent the guys to get us out to the wrong floor...but remember we are the stupid ones. We asked to speak with the manager to let him know that we were unhappy. He wouldn't even come out of his office. Never again. Try the luxor very nice hotel & staff.

Reviews.Title: “Fun and Friendly”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Fitz. for the first time, Aug. 6-9. We arrived at 9:00am and check in is not until 2:00pm, but they let us check in early - which was great because we could go back to sleep after our long flight. We had a great time playing roulette, craps, and slots. During the day, they have 50 cent roulette - always fun! The craps table is a blast to play. The $1 slot machines are great and awesome payout! The entire casino has an excellent atmosphere. All of the dealers wore hawaiian print shirts - which showed their fun side. Definately sign up for the Fitz. Club card. We ate at Limericks Stake House - you have to try the shrimp or chicken scampi. Both excellent choices! I have to tell you that after reading some of the postings - we were a little worried. However, we had a great time with no complaints! We will definately return to the Fitz!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “My home away from home”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Fitz for many years. We have always had a great time and felt welcome. The staff are great and will do anything for you. We can almost always check in early and get a late check out that makes it great for late departures. Say hello to Patrick at the craps table for me when you get there

Reviews.Title: “Nice Room, Nice People= Great Experience!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Before our trip last weekend to Las Vegas we did some research and saw a number of negative reviews on the Fitz. But, they offered the best deal ($49.00!) for a weekend room and money was an issue (isn't it always?) so we decided to give it a try anyway. Good decision! Frankly, we were expecting an older room that might be in need of remodeling, but even that would have been acceptable. For us, going to Vegas isn't about the room- we're hardly in it anyway. lol What we got was a very pleasant surprise! Though we arrived VERY late (2:00AM) due to a terrible accident on the I-15 (we were parked for nearly an hour!), they were able to give us an upgraded, recently remodeled room on the 19th floor with a wonderful view of the strip. It was clean, spacious, quiet and very comfortable. From the moment we arrived to our departure Sunday afternoon, everyone was nice. The food was fine, the casino wasn't too crowded and we won a little money too! (Don't worry, they got it all back!!) We had a great time downtown and happily spent nearly all of Saturday wandering from casino to casino and enjoying the many shops and vendors. Some people have complained about slow elevators and we didn't experience that at all. The longest we waited was perhaps one minute and most of the time it was only a few seconds. Also, and for those of you like me who schlepp their own luggage to and from the car, the parking garage elevators and the guest room elevators are only 50 feet or so apart. I've been in some hotels where it's a half-day hike! For me, it's little things like that that make a big difference. Same thing with the room. Though we were as far from the elevators as possible, because it's not a gigantic hotel, the walk wasn't bad at all. I've never stayed downtown before, but I would book another room at the Fitz without hesitation! Our only complaint, and this is a tiny one, would be the parking garage. It's very small and cramped, but if that's the worst I can think of, I'd say they did a pretty good job! Thank you Fitz for one of the best weekends I've spent in Vegas!

Reviews.Title: “Nice, but should have been better.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Although, the hotel itself was very nice and we loved the location, we were not satisfied with our room. We had problems with dirty toilets and dirty sheets when we arrived. Our tub had a huge crack in it so when we showered it flooded or floor. And when our air conditioner kicked in, it sounded like a car hit the wall.

Reviews.Title: “Good to their guests”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We just returned from Vegas and had a great time. Fitzgeralds treats it's guests wonderfully. We saw Celine Dion's show at Ceasars, it was amazing expensive but worth it.

Reviews.Title: “Our favorite Hotel in Vegas”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We always have a great stay at this hotel. We love to stay downtown and the rooms here have everything a gambler wants: very clean and comfortable. The staff is always helpful. The rooms are perfectly located (the elevator from the tower opens up right into the casino - no 1/4 mile walk like the big places). The food is good. We love Limerick's steakhouse. Awesome crab legs and a ton for a cheap price. I would highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “got lucky in vegas”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: stayed at fitzgerald in april in 2004. left stay with $2000 more than i came with winning at a variety of slots. booked a 3 night stay and hotel from detroit for $500 for two. recieved free nights for secound vacation any time within the next 6 months. Entertainment was decent and free. down town hotel easy walking distance to a dozen different casinos. Did witness the police fight with a couple of criminals outside hotel on different nights. would recommend the fitzgerald i have already made reservation for return trip.

Reviews.Title: “Love the Fitz!!!”
Reviews.Author: BostonSean
Reviews.Content: A great deal and a good hotel. Room was clean and comfortable, staff was great. Downtown is safe, clean, and people are treated much better down here. Will only stay downtown from now on.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Reasonable”
Reviews.Author: Twincher
Reviews.Content: Recently stayed at the Fitzgerald's downtown Las Vegas, April 1-4, 2004 with two other friends. Room was comfortable, bathroom roomy. Staff friendly. Russell at the Daquari Bar was not the most pleasant bartendar. Go to the free Elvis show. Lots of fun. I would stay at the Fitzgerald's again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed 4 nights at The Fitz in December. The room was comfortable and clean. The casino was fun to play in & comps were not hard to come by. We enjoyed downtown Las Vegas and The Fitz was a great value!

Reviews.Title: “first downtown stay”
Reviews.Author: jmanmi
Reviews.Content: My wife and I decided to stay on Fremont St. mainly because it was a lot less expensive. The workers at the Fitz were very freindly. The hotel is old but kept in nice shape. The elevators do take a while to get to the floors. During our stay someone won one of the cars on a nickel slot machine!!! The food was good. The noise from Fremont st. (there is a band shell right next door) on the weekends is loud but it is a weekend who needs to sleep before 2:00am. We were happy with our stay and will be returning here.

Reviews.Title: “excellent deal, can't beat it!”
Reviews.Author: Pence65
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed at Fitzgeralds with another couple for 4 days beginning on March 8. This is the third time to stay there. We always get a great deal. Use America West, cheap packages. The valet service is excellent. We don't eat there, but the nickle slots are pretty good. The rooms are clean, good size, we stayed on the 34th floor this time, and had a good view of the Western casino and all its lively nitelife. Was happy to see the new pool. Overall, the new owners are making a good place even better. Only one complaint, the elevators are notoriously slow. But, who is in a hurry when you are on vacation? We will continue to stay at the Fitzgerald.

Reviews.Title: “Great times at Fitxgeralds and Downtown Las Vegas”
Reviews.Author: old_gal69
Reviews.Content: We used to stay at the Golden Nugget-the cost was enormous -especially on the week-ends. I am elderly with a disability and you always had to walk so far to get to the different towers. I did not like their card system either-you had to stay at one machine to accumulate points. We then decided about four years ago- we'd try the Fitzgerald. And we just love it and couldn't ask for more.! We get good comps- they run contests-food is delicious with a variety of restaurants. And with their card system - you can move to as many machines as you'd like and the points are given to you. The rooms are nice-but needed a little sprucing up-but from what I see -the new owners have just done that. Even a swimming pool has been put in. We are looking forward to our stay for 9 days at the end of this month. I think if you stay there-you and your family will love it too!

Reviews.Title: “Like The Downtown”
Reviews.Author: jungle
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a 5 night stay at Fitzgeralds. Avoided the internet travel agencies and dealt directly with America West Vacations.. Why pay the middle man..270 bucks for a five night, 6 day stay from Seattle..(Air alone was over 200 dollars)...Had a nice room on the 27th floor, nice view and clean room...Sheryl allowed me to check in at 11 am....only took about 5 minutes...Housekeeping was not too great as they did not leave soap and shampoo..a simple call took care of the problem...hotel operator was great...called to make sure I got messages...Buffet was not good..cashier couldn't get MC to work, so she had hostess read off my card numbers, twice, loud, in front of several other people..not good policy!!! Tight slots, so went to 4 Queens where there were loose slots...Will stay again in April...

Reviews.Title: “Nice Visit to Vegas”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Our overall trip was great. We stayed at the Fitzpatrick and had read a review that said to ask for a corner room above the 19th floor. We did and got one and it was a beautiful view of the mountains and vegas lights. Overall, for the price of the rooms they were good. The rooms were clean and we had no problems while staying at this hotel. We usually stay on the strip and this was our first attempt to stay downtown. It was fun.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Tim”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed on a Saturday night. Got a great rate through -------. We had two rooms on the 23rd floor. Rooms were average. No complaints. Staff was extremely friendly. Ever staff member we saw said hi and asked how we were doing. Had a problem late at night with a loud party in room next door. Security took care of it. Ate lunch at the cafe. Food was ok but not excellent. Had two little kids with us. No problems. Had McDonalds. Location is wonderful. Walk right outside to see the Fremont show. Would stay again.

HotelInfo.Name: Fitzgeralds Casino & Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 301 Fremont Street, Las Vegas, NV 89101
